column5: Looks like im gonna be up at my friends place on 12 mile this weekend.  Has anyone ever fished it?  I know that there are lakers in that lake but is there much else?   A step in the right direction will be appreciated!  Dont want anyones honey holes just a few opinions as to what to target and tactics for this lake.
Singingdog might be able to help, he's local and knows his fish!

A fellow co-worker has a cottage there. He dosn't fish but told me stories of seeing huge bass sitting on their spawning beds. Acutually he invited us up there, so Im waited to see what other say about the lake.

I fished twelve mile and the connecting lakes quite a bit when I was younger.  I never fished for lakers, I was more into the smallmouth.  All three lakes (Boshkung, Little Boshkung, and Twelve Mile) had decent bass fishing with more smallmouth than largemouth being caught. There are some pretty obvious spots on the lake that hold fish, you'll see them.  When the fishing pressure was on, I used to catch smallmouth mid lake on little bosh, the lakes not that deep or big so you can cover the open water effectively and usually locate some untapped willing fish.  Goodluck!

Anyone have a Twelve Mile Lake Chart they could PM me? Buddy is heading up with his kids and asked me if I had any info or lake chart I could give him. I have lots but not that lake. Just trying to help the guy out. Thanks Guys
Its on Navionics.  Look here:  https://webapp.navionics.com/#boating/search@11&key=uvxqGptk_N  S.
Sorry, don't fish that lake much. Good luck.
Its on Navionics.  Look here:  https://webapp.navionics.com/#boating/search@11&key=uvxqGptk_N  S. Thanks Sinker.
